title: Instance Component
description: Captures the specific attributes of a generic object within the context of a single event (Entanglement).

physics_properties.title: Base Physics Properties
physics_properties.description: Defines the common physics-related properties for components and laws.

collapse_sensitive.description: Indicates if the object is affected by or triggers quantum collapse.

engine.description: The physics engine responsible for this object.

is_quantum.description: Indicates if the object has quantum properties.

generic_thread_id.title: Entity ID Field
generic_thread_id.description: A reusable definition for a unique entity identifier.

specific_attributes.title: String Value Map
specific_attributes.description: A generic key-value map where keys are strings and values can be any JSON type. Used for flexible data structures like parameters or metadata.

significance_score.title: Normalized Value
significance_score.description: A reusable definition for a floating-point number normalized between 0.0 and 1.0.
